title: English Reading Comprehension
description: Develop reading comprehension skills through engaging passages about teamwork, school projects, and garden activities for Class 5 students.

subtopics.title: Reading Comprehension Passage 1
subtopics.content:
## Teamwork in School Exhibition

Rinki and her classmates were preparing for a school exhibition. Everyone was assigned a task. Rinki had to design the poster for their project. She noticed that her friend Aman was struggling to build the model. Instead of ignoring him, she suggested a new idea and also helped him complete it. Their teamwork impressed the teacher, and the project was selected for display.
subtopics.codeExample:
### Understanding the Passage:
- Who was preparing for the school exhibition?
- What task was assigned to Rinki?
- How did Rinki help her friend Aman?
- What was the result of their teamwork?

### Vocabulary Building:
- Identify words related to school activities
- Find words showing helping behavior
- Note words describing emotions and results

subtopics.title: Reading Comprehension Passage 2
subtopics.content:
## Planting Saplings in the Garden

In a small garden, children from different classes planted saplings. Each group chose a leader to guide them. One group's leader, Meera, made sure everyone got a chance to work. When one student tried to leave early and claim the credit, Meera politely explained the importance of honesty and encouraged him to finish his part.
subtopics.codeExample:
### Key Comprehension Questions:
- Where were the children working?
- What did each group choose?
- How did Meera behave as a leader?
- What important value did Meera teach?

### Theme Discussion:
- Importance of leadership
- Value of honesty
- Team participation
- Completing responsibilities
